summary: Implements an LDAP‑based attack workflow that first validates the privileges of a compromised account, extracts directory information when the account lacks admin rights, and, if the account holds high‑level rights, creates new AD objects (users, computers, DNS entries) and modifies group memberships to elevate the attacker to Domain Administrator.
business_intent: To automate the exploitation of Active Directory via LDAP for privilege escalation, data harvesting, and persistence, enabling attackers to gain full control over the domain.
